thread.title: Sania Mirza treats SRK, Team 'Dilwale' with another dawat
thread.title_full: Sania Mirza treats SRK, Team 'Dilwale' with another dawat - newsR

author: newsr.in
title: Sania Mirza treats SRK, Team 'Dilwale' with another dawat
text:
*New Delhi Oct. 14(ANI): And they meet again.Sania Mirza recently revisited the sets of 'Dilwale' to treat Shah Rukh Khan, Kajol and rest of the 'Dilwale' team with another round of Biryani.*
New Delhi Oct. 14(ANI): And they meet again.Sania Mirza recently revisited the sets of 'Dilwale' to treat Shah Rukh Khan, Kajol and rest of the 'Dilwale' team with another round of Biryani. Talking about the delicious treat, the 49-year-old actor tweeted, "Sania Mirza your returns are impeccable but the Biryani you 'serve' is untouchable. Your smile won over the whole Dilwale set. Thanks." The 'Chennai Express' star was accompanied by Varun Dhawan, Kajol, Varun Sharma and Farah Khan for the Dilwale Ki Dawaat. Meanwhile Farah tweeted, "@iamsrk We like guests who bring their own food! "Dilwale ki Daawat "was such fun last nite @MirzaSania @Varun_dvn" (ANI) Â»
